patthana15.77:4.1: Saraṇaṃ dassanena pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.77:5.1: Saraṇaṃ bhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.77:6.1: Araṇaṃ nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā naaraṇo nanevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
